name: elm-datocms-structured-text
description: [DatoCMS](https://www.datocms.com/) is a headless CMS that uses a custom format based on a [unist tree](https://github.com/syntax-tree/unist) for its rich-text fields. This type of field is called `Structure Text` and the format specification is known as `DatoCMS Abstract Syntax Tree` or `DAST`
